title: Understanding Thermodynamics Concepts Through Data-Driven Visualization Learning in Large-Scale Settings

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic physics and fundamental thermodynamics terminology
context.additional_context: A short-term intensive course designed for current practitioners to apply thermodynamics concepts to real-world tasks, utilizing data visualization tools in a smartphone-based limited-technology environment.

learning_goals: Learners can explain the energy conversion process in thermodynamic systems using visualized data
Learners can quantitatively analyze the Carnot cycle and entropy change concepts through interactive graphs
Learners can perform thermodynamic calculation simulations in a mobile environment and interpret the results

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
